"Beach Wars 3!":
"Summer means sea! And don't forget Xie!
There's no finer ocean than Wopal's!
I was hoping to organise a vacation for
everyone, but Darkers and Oceanids
showed up and started going wild...!
They're ruining all my plans!
Please! I need all of you to help chase
them off so we can enjoy ourselves!
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"

"This area seems to have a high
concentration of Photons that are
especially compatible with the
materials used to make swimsuits."

"If you're wearing a swimsuit, you'll
be able to benefit from a special PSE."

"Wearing a swimsuit as you carry
out your mission could help you out
quite a bit. Take advantage of it."
